featured.text: Most people who contract West Nile do not experience any symptoms at all, but, if they do, symptoms typically develop between 3 to 14 days after a mosquito bite.
The 70-year-old professor sued the university for age _____, because his teaching contract had not been renewed.
This group of islands off the coast of Ecuador has recently contracted Argentine Corporación America to manage the redevelopment of the airport on the island of Baltra.
The increasing population in Texas raised the risk of contracting the disease.

definition.zh_def: 合同；協議，通常是法律上具有約束力的文件。
definition.en_def: A written or spoken agreement, especially one concerning employment, sales, or tenancy, that is intended to be enforceable by law.
definition.example: They signed a contract to finalize the sale of the house.
